author: John Hayward, John Hayward
title: China Pushes ‘Health Silk Road’ to Take over Global Health Care
description: Chinese state media on Wednesday pushed the notion of a “Health Silk Road,” modeled after the New Silk Road infrastructure program, which later came to be known as the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI). In other words, having infected the entire planet with the …
content:
Chinese state media on Wednesday pushed the notion of a Health Silk Road, modeled after the New Silk Road infrastructure program, which later came to be known as the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI).
